A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was 11 years old when Episode iV came out so feel able to have a seasoned and objective view on the films.  Episode VIII had only 2 flaws - the scene with Leia in space was poorly conceived and even worse executed\, plus the scene on Canto Bight was way too long - but I suspect important hooks are being created here for Episode IX.  My overall opinion is that this is right up there with the best of the original trilogy but a view more viewings and a bit of time will be needed to put Episodes Iv\, V and VIII in their correct order - Star Wars truly returned after 3 decades with The Force Awakens and took another step forward with The Last Jedi.  Anyone who doesn't think Luke left as a hero really doesn't understand the nature of true heroics.
